Božović: Nacionalni savet za visoko obrazovanje potvrdio da postoje nezakonitosti u radu Više medici

06 Nov 2019, 10:25

Poslanik Demokratske stranke Balša Božović saopštio je da mu je predsednik Nacionalog saveta za visoko obrazovanje prof. dr Bela Balint potvrdio da je savet u više navrata zahtevao od ministra prosvete Mladena Šarčevića da se izvrši inspekcijski nadzor nad radom Visoke medicinske škole u Ćupriji, kao i da je dat nalog Nacionalnom akreditacionom telu da izvrši kontrolu kvaliteta rada ove škole, što su oni odbili da učine. "U školi u kojoj je prosvetna inspekcija već utvrdila da su visoki funkcioneri Srpske napredne stranke zaposleni protivzakonito, medicinskim sestrama nastavu drži državni sekretar i visoki funkcioner SNS Ivan Bošnjak, po obrazovanju veterinar zadužen za kontrolu svinjskog mesa, šef poslaničke grupe SNS doktor pravnih nauka pred praznom učionicom drži navodna predavanja zbog kojih dobija sedmu platu, a pod velom tajne, mimo zakona i bez znanja NN veća akreditovan je i još jedan master smer, samo da bi na njemu predavao zamenik šefa poslaničke grupe SNS inženjer Vladimir Orlić", naveo je Božović.U saopštenju se dodaje da žene koje su otpuštene iz ove škole da bi se funkcioneri SNS zaposlili, doktorke medicinskih nauka ili doktorantkinje, moraju biti vraćene na posao, a budući medicinski radnici moraju dobiti kvalitetno obrazovanje.Ministar Mladen Šarčević je u više navrata najavljivao da će se ovo desiti, obećavao da će ugovori sa "njegovim stranačkim pajtašima" biti raskinuti kako je i naložila prosvetna inspekcija, tvrdio da će situacija u ovoj školi biti rešena, ali ništa od toga se nije dogodilo, navodi se u saopštenju.Božović je poručio ministru da se seti javno izrečenih obećanja kako će svih devet žena vratiti na posao, ili da javno prizna da je nemoćan da Visoku medicinsku školu u Ćupriji oslobodi okupacije svojih stranačkih kolega i da podnese ostavku.

Bozovic: National Council for Higher Education confirmed that there are illegalities in the work of More Medici

06 Nov 2019, 09:25

Democrat deputy Balsa Bozovic announced that his chairman of the National Council for Higher Education was prof. Bela Balint, Ph.D., confirmed that the Council has repeatedly requested Education Minister Mladen Sarcevic to inspect the work of the Ćuprija Higher Medical School, as well as to order the National Accreditation Body to control the quality of work of this school, which they refused to do. "In a school where the education inspection has already determined that senior officials of the Serbian Progressive Party are employed illegally, nurses are taught by the State Secretary and SNS senior official Ivan Bosnjak, a veterinarian in charge of pork control by education, head of the SNS parliamentary group Doctor of Laws before Empty classroom holds alleged lectures for which he receives a seventh salary, and under the veil of secrecy, another master's degree has been accredited by the law and without the knowledge of the NN Chamber, only to be taught by SNS deputy group chief engineer Vladimir Orlic, "Bozovic said .The statement added that women who were dismissed from this school in order to hire SNS officials, doctors of medical sciences or doctoral students, must be returned to work, and future medical professionals must receive a quality education.Minister Mladen Sarcevic has repeatedly stated that will this happen, he promised to contract with "his party pate Ashima "to be terminated as instructed by the education inspectorate, argued that the situation at this school would be resolved, but none of this happened, the statement said. Bozovic told the minister to remember the publicly promised promises that all nine women would return to work, or to publicly admit that he is powerless to release the Higher Medical School in Cuprija from the occupation of his party colleagues and to resign.
